desc.p: A maximum of 7 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: ALL COMPANY
A maximum of 24 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the FILE.CONTROL file.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: FIN CUS
In the case of Multi-Book environment, it is possible to control copying of FIN level parameter files in the new company, through this field.
If this field is set to YES or NULL, the file(s) will be copied to the new company.

If this field is set to NO, then the FIN level parameter files will not be copied to new company at the time of creation of new company. Instead the parameter set for the master company will be referred.
Default is NULL, when the FIN level parameter files will be copied in the new company..
If it is set to YES, then the FIN level parameter files will be copied in the new company.
If it is set to NO, then the FIN level parameter files will NOT be copied in the new company.
Field can be inputted in Multi-book environment only
In Multi-company environment, this field will be a no-input field.
